Articles.Content:
I've 'tested' 21:9 and 32:9 resolutions, and it looks awesome, clearly this game was made for wider screens looking at how the UI is implemented. And since it does not seem to cause any more bugs. 

Only thing that needs to be worked on further is loading screens not being stretched but enveloped so we have black bars left and right when loading. 

Can you stop the game forcing 16:9 resolutions? 

Edited March 17, 2023 by LoSBoL
Added loading screen behavior
